snippet: Arjen Robben extended his contract with Bayern Munich through 2015 despite his dispute with his teammate Franck Ribéry during the Champions League semifinals.
abstract: Bayern Munich and winger Arjen Robben agree to three-year contract extension; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Arjen Robben extended his contract with Bayern Munich through 2015 despite his dispute with his teammate Franck Ribéry during the Champions League semifinals.
